name: twitter-read
title: Twitter Read MCP Server
description: MCP server for reading Twitter/X engagement data including tweet metrics, mentions, replies, and search with built-in rate limiting

required.name: TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN
required.description: Twitter API v2 Bearer Token for app-only authentication

optional.name: TWITTER_API_KEY
optional.description: Twitter API Key (alternative to Bearer Token for OAuth 2.0)

optional.name: TWITTER_API_SECRET
optional.description: Twitter API Secret (required if using API Key)

tools.name: get_tweet_metrics
tools.description: Get engagement metrics for a specific tweet including likes, retweets, replies, and impressions

tools.name: get_mentions
tools.description: Get recent @mentions of the authenticated account

tools.name: get_replies
tools.description: Get replies to a specific tweet

tools.name: search_tweets
tools.description: Search for tweets matching a query and return results with engagement metrics
